dilution_policy_limit_pct_source: up to a total amount of 5% of the issued share capital of the Company.
ceo_ltip_max_pct_of_salary_source: “The face value of the awards… was €6m for the CEO” and “€540,000 annual base salary paid to each executive director.”
post_cessation_holding_years_source: Executive directors will be required to hold shares exceeding 100% of salary … for two years post-employment.
shareholding_requirement_ceo_source: Minimum share ownership requirements are set at three times executive director base salary.

extraction_notes: Currency set to EUR as remuneration and award values are presented in euros. Dilution policy limit (5%) taken from LTIP pool limit. CEO LTIP max % of salary computed as €6,000,000 face value at full vesting divided by €540,000 base salary = 11.111… (reported as 1111.11%). Post-cessation holding set to 2 years; CEO shareholding requirement set to 3x salary. No short-term incentive is proposed and no bonus awarded for 2024; target/max bonus % not disclosed. No disclosure enabling calculation of total or LTIP dilution, CEO or workforce salary increase.
